participant_abstract.sent: We discussed user requierements, technical requierements and user interface design issues.
And the we took descision on remote control functions.
The users find current remote control ugly, very complex and use only few of all the buttons.
Also they want a remote control that is easy to find and fit well in hand.
The decisions taken address those issues (see bellow).

participant_actions.sent: The following task have been assigned for next meeting: ID: the components concept UID: the user interface concept ME: trend watching.

participant_decisions.sent: The remote control should be simple: - few buttons: volume, mute, channel incremental (wheel), previous channel button, channel digits (smaller buttons, protected behind a plastic cover that can be opened), on/off button.
The remote control shoud be easy to find: lightening in the dark.
To reduce cost and time to market we decided not to include LCD display or voice command (it could then be on the market in one month).
The remote control should avoid RSI (fit well in hand).

participant_problems.sent: To reduce cost and time to market we discarded voice and lcd features which can be a problem to attract young customers.
